DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal ( menstruate least 1 year ) Plasma triacylglycerol ( TAG ) 0.8 4.0 mmol/l Body mass index ( BMI ) 1835 kg/m2 Total cholesterol ( TC ) : < 8 mmol/l Systolic blood pressure < 160 mmHg diastolic blood pressure < 100 mmHg Nonsmoker Having suffer myocardial infarction/stroke past 12 month Diabetic ( diagnose fast blood glucose > 7 mmol/l ) suffer endocrine disorder Suffering renal bowel disease history cholestatic liver pancreatitis On drug treatment hyperlipidaemia , hypertension , inflammation hypercoagulation History alcohol abuse On hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) Planning weight reduce regime Taking nutritional supplement ( e.g . fish oil , calcium ) Anaemic : haemoglobin < 11.5 g/dl
